channel.title: aws on Notepadium
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Notepadium

item.title: AWS CLI COMMANDS
item.description: S3 const S3Commands: { makeBucket: (name) => `aws s3 mb s3://${name}` listBukets: 'aws s3 ls', listPath: (path) => `aws s3 ls s3://${path}`, deleteBucket: (name) => `aws s3 rb s3://${name}`,, forceDeleteBucket: (name) => `aws s3 rb s3://${name}--force`, copyFile: (filepath, targetPath) => `aws s3 cp ${filepath}s3://${targetPath}`, //ExcludeRule and IncludeRule should be written multiple times for each, if there are multiple rules.

item.title: AWS-Basic
item.description: S3 Client deploy can be done using aws s3 sync <source> s3://<target> on package.
